DOC.brief_summary: To study effect coenzyme Q10 semen parameter men idiopathic infertility
DOC.brief_title: Neotililty Trial : Effect Coenzyme Q10 Semen Parameters Men With Idiopathic Infertility
DOC.detailed_description: Decreased serum CoQ10 concentration well decrease CoQ10H2 to-ubiquinone ratio demonstrate disease associate OS . A strong correlation among sperm count , motility ubiquinol-10 level seminal fluid also report . The aim present study investigate whether effect exogenous administration ubiquinol improvement semen parameter Pakistani men population . Patients full fill inclusion criterion give inform write consent include trial . Patient start take coenzyme q10 take 26 week . All men undergo thorough physical examination , detail history , serum biochemical hematological laboratory test measurement serum sex thyroid hormone level . Randomization code provide first investigator use computer generate random number table . The randomization cod centrally assign coordination eligibility criterion . A questionnaire use collect information demographic characteristic . Two semen sample 1and 2 month apart obtain 3 5 day sexual abstinence process within 1 hour ejaculation . The mean two use statistical analysis . Semen analyse perform use WHO recommend method
DOC.criteria: To sign Informed Consent form Patients recruit study fulfil criterion history primary infertility 2 year , abnormal sperm count motility Wife age 20 40 year No know medical surgical condition result infertility Voluntary withdrawal Poor compliance visit/treatment A history cancer chemotherapy radiotherapy A history genital disease cryptorchidism varicocele ; history genital surgery Body mass index 30 kg/m great ; endocrinopathy Ychromosome microdeletions karyotype abnormality leukocytospermia Drug substance abuse ; tobacco use ; Use anticonvulsant , androgen antiandrogens Significant liver ( serum bilirubin great 2.0 mg/dl ) Renal function ( serum creatinine great 2.0 mg/dl ) impairment Patients severe oligozoospermia ( le 5 X 106/ml ) , azoospermia testicular volume le 12 ml also exclude study .
